definitions.definition: The state or level of consciousness where sense data can be confirmed by an observer .
examples: I gradually passed from sleep to full awareness .

definitions.definition: The state or quality of being aware of something.
examples: The awareness of one type of idea naturally fosters an awareness of another idea

main_definition: The state or level of consciousness where sense data can be confirmed by an observer .
secondary_definitions: The state or quality of being aware of something.
